org.daisy.dotify.api.paper

Class TractorPaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.api.paper.AbstractPaper
      • org.daisy.dotify.api.paper.TractorPaper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FactoryProperties, Paper

    public class TractorPaper
extends AbstractPaper
    Provides a paper object for perforated paper with paper guides.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
